judul: Python Concurrency: Asynchronous Programming with Asyncio
konten: Asyncio is a Python library that provides asynchronous programming support. It allows you to write...

contoh.isi:
# Example of asynchronous programming with Asyncio
import asyncio

async def main():
    print('Hello')
    await asyncio.sleep(1)
    print('world')

# Run asynchronous program
asyncio.run(main())

topik.topik: Pemrograman Asynchronous dengan Asyncio dalam Python
topik.deskripsi: Menggunakan Asyncio untuk mendukung pemrograman asynchronous dalam aplikasi Python.

highlight: Python library that provides asynchronous programming support

error.deskripsi: RuntimeError occurred due to error during Asyncio program execution.
error.solusi: Check and fix errors reported during Asyncio program execution.

judul: Python Neural Networks: Building a Deep Neural Network with Keras
konten: Keras is a high-level neural networks API written in Python that allows you to build and train deep neural networks...

contoh.isi:
# Example of building a deep neural network with Keras
import tensorflow as tf
from tensorflow.keras.models import Sequential
from tensorflow.keras.layers import Dense

# Define model
model = Sequential([
    Dense(64, activation='relu', input_shape=(10,)),
    Dense(64, activation='relu'),
    Dense(1)
])

# Compile model
model.compile(optimizer='adam', loss=tf.keras.losses.BinaryCrossentropy(from_logits=True), metrics=['accuracy'])

# Train model
model.fit(X_train, y_train, epochs=10, batch_size=32, validation_data=(X_val, y_val))
contoh.komentar: Builds a deep neural network using Keras.

topik.topik: Pembuatan Deep Neural Network dengan Keras dalam Python
topik.deskripsi: Menggunakan Keras untuk membangun dan melatih deep neural network dalam Python.

highlight: high-level neural networks API written in Python

error.deskripsi: ValueError occurred due to invalid value or data type in Keras example.
error.solusi: Ensure correct values and data types are used when compiling model with Keras.
